Uses of Class
Number.Base.Converter.Base

  • Packages that use Base 
    Package Description
    Number.Base.Converter  
    Number.Base.Converter.Exceptions  

    • Uses of Base in Number.Base.Converter

      Fields in Number.Base.Converter declared as Base 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Base Base.BINARY
      This is the binary base, which has only the symbols 0 and 1.
      static Base Base.DECIMAL
      This is the decimal base, the most used base.
      static Base Base.HEXADECIMAL
      This is the hexadecimal base, it has the digits 0 to 9 and the letters A to F.
      static Base Base.OCTAL
      This is an octal base, it has the symbols 0 to 7.
      Methods in Number.Base.Converter with parameters of type Base 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String Converter.convertToCustomBase(long number, Base base)
      Convert a given number to this base.
      static java.lang.String Converter.ConvertToCustomBase(java.lang.String number, Base sourceBase, Base targetBase)
      Converts the given numberin the form of String (can be any base), for the base given in the base parameter.
      static long Converter.convertToDecimal(java.lang.String number, Base base)
      Converts the given number, to the decimal base.
      java.lang.String Formatter.format(java.lang.String number, Base base)
      Formats the number entered, separating its digits with the separator character in groups of size equal to groupedDigits .
